5.title: CS 7643 Deep Learning
5.content: This site contains (most of) my study material while taking CS 7643, respecting the appropriate honor codes. These materials include course notes, readings, exercises, assignment (high-level) descriptions, and some projects I did on my own time to reinforce my learning.

6.title: Schedule
6.content: This schedule reflects my own pace and deadlines, very close to the actual ones but not identical. Coursework activities are classified by a name and a color in order to make them more identifiable, and mean the following: . | Activity Relatively short deliverables, like quizzes | Assignment Official assignments | Project Self-assigned programming projects for my own learning experience. The only deliverable project is AI-assisted driving | . | Week 1 | Linear classifiers and gradient descent | . | Activity | Quiz 0 | . | Assignment | Deep neural networks from scratch out | . | Project | Multi-car tracking out | . | Week 2 | Deep neural networks | . | Activity | Quiz 1 | . | Week 3 | Optimization of deep neural networks | . | Assignment | Deep neural networks from scratch due | . | Project | Multi-car tracking due | . | Week 4 | Convolution and pooling layers | . | Activity | Quiz 2 | . | Assignment | Convolutional neural networks from scratch out | . | Project | Object detection out | . | Week 5 | Convolutional neural architectures | . |   | No deliverables | . | Week 6 | Visualization Pytorch | . | Assignment | Convolutional neural networks from scratch due | . | Week 7 | Advanced vision architectures Bias and fairness | . | Activity | Quiz 3 | . | Assignment | Visualization and style transfer out | . | Project | Object detection due | . | Week 8 | Structured representations Language models | . | Assignment | Visualization and style transfer due | . | Project | Image captioning out | . | Week 9 | Embeddings | . | Assignment | Neural machine translation out | . | Week 10 | Neural attention models | . | Activity | Final project presentation | . | Project | Image captioning due | . | Week 11 | Neural machine translation Automated speech recognition | . | Activity | Quiz 4 | . | Assignment | Neural machine translation due | . | Project | AI-assisted driving out | . | Week 12 | Deep reinforcement learning | . |   | No deliverables | . | Week 13 | Unsupervised and semi-supervised learning | . |   | No deliverables | . | Week 14 | Generative models | . | Activity | Quiz 5 | . | Week 15 |   | . |   | No deliverables | . | Week 16 |   | . | Project | AI-assisted driving due | .
